attributes.action: Accept Syrian Women, Old People and Children In, Help Men go back and Fight.
attributes.background: We must help Syrian men go back and fight for their country. Our ancestors stood and fought for ours during the Hitler regime. They must learn to tackle ISIS with our help.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107807

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
